issue.title: [JS] add logging
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4588](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4588). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3634, the javascript library will need some logging infrastructure. The goals for this implementation are a lightweight logger that can be easily configured to not write to console.
